pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: entry (in a form, register, diary, etc.)

lessons.japanese: 筆記用具を持って来るのを忘れた。
lessons.english: I have forgotten to bring something to write with.

lessons.japanese: 筆記用具を持って来るのを忘れた。
lessons.english: I have forgotten to bring something to write with.

lessons.japanese: 筆記体は読めないので、ブロック体で書いてもらえませんか？
lessons.english: I can't read cursive, so could you write in block letters, please?

lessons.japanese: 筆記体は読めないので、ブロック体で書いてもらえませんか？
lessons.english: I can't read cursive, so could you write in block letters, please?

lessons.japanese: トムは秘書に口述筆記で手紙を書かせた。
lessons.english: Tom dictated a letter to his secretary.

lessons.japanese: トムは秘書に口述筆記で手紙を書かせた。
lessons.english: Tom dictated a letter to his secretary.

lessons.japanese: 筆記試験は午前8時からで、口頭試験は午前10時からです。
lessons.english: The written exam will begin at 8 a.m. and the oral exam at 10 a.m.
